properties.areaDesc: Copiah, MS; Hinds, MS; Simpson, MS; Rankin, MS
properties.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 14 at 12:25PM CST until January 14 at 3:30PM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a

* Flash Flood Warning for...
Southern Rankin County in central Mississippi...
Northern Simpson County in central Mississippi...
Southern Hinds County in central Mississippi...
Northern Copiah County in central Mississippi...

* Until 330 PM CST.

* At 1224 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing
heavy rain across the warned area. One to two inches of rain have
fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.

HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas,
highways, streets and underpasses as well as other
drainage and low lying areas.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Jackson, Byram, Richland, Crystal Springs, Mendenhall, Star,
Florence, Raymond, Terry, Utica, Piney Woods, Dentville, Dry Grove,
Martinville, Cato, Hopewell, Whites, Johns, Harrisville and
Monterey.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

CMAMtext: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 3:30 PM CST. Avoid flooded areas.
